title: Elon Musk Buying Twitter Is a Moment of Celebration for Many
description: The way forward for Twitter is uncertain. But that means Mr. Musk can innovate and change the platform for the better, his supporters say.
dc:creator: Erin Griffith
media:credit: Odd Andersen/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:description: Elon Musk has fans known variously as Muskies, Muskites, Muskrats and Musketeers. They are enthusiastic about his purchase of Twitter.
